techs.name: Range Enhancement
techs.description: Increases range by {0}

techs.name: Disintegration
techs.description: Bombards enemy ground units within a {1}m radius every {0}s, causing them to lose {2}% of their current HP and reducing their movement speed by {4}% for {3}s.

techs.name: Dark Companion
techs.description: At the beginning of the battle, summon 1 Wraith at the same Rank as Abyss.

techs.name: Swarm Missiles
techs.description: Launches {1} missiles at nearby ground enemies every {0} seconds. Each missile deals {2} with a range of {3}m. Damage increases by {2} per unit Rank increased.

techs.name: Photon Coating
techs.description: Covers the unit with a photon coating, decreasing damage received by {1}% within {0}s after the start of the battle, and grants immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects

techs.name: Energy Shield
techs.description: Obtain an Energy Shield that absorbs damage equal to the unit's HP and can block at least one instance of damage.

techs.name: Energy Absorption
techs.description: Increases HP by {0}% and converts damage dealt to HP

techs.name: Aerial Mode
techs.description: Void Eye transforms into a flying unit that can attack air and its movement speed is increased by {1}, but its range is reduced by {0}.

techs.name: Range Enhancement
techs.description: Increases range by {0}

techs.name: Charged Shot
techs.description: Increases ATK by {0}% but increases attack interval by {1}%

techs.name: Suppression Shots
techs.description: Increases Void Eye's range by {2},  and its attacks reduce target's range by {1}% for {0} seconds

techs.name: Electromagnetic Armor
techs.description: Void Eye causes electromagnetic interference on enemies attacking it, temporarily disabling their Tech and reducing their movement speed by {1}% for {0} seconds.

techs.name: Saturation Bombardment
techs.description: Increases splash range by {2}, and each attack fires {0} shells in succession, and shells spread out over a wide area, but increases attack interval by {1}%.

techs.name: Mountain Plating
techs.description: Blocks {0} damage when attacked. The damage blocking effect increases with the Rank. And for each Rank, blocks an additional {0} damage.

techs.name: Anti-Aircraft Ammunition
techs.description: Decreases ATK by {0}%, allowing Mountain to attack aerial targets.

techs.name: Range Enhancement
techs.description: Increases range by {0}

techs.name: Extended Range Ammo
techs.description: Increases range by {0}, but decreases ATK by {1}%.

techs.name: Gun-launched Missile
techs.description: Launches a rocket from its arm cannons every {0} seconds. The rocket has a range of {2}, causing {4} damage to enemies within a {3}m radius of the hit point. Damage increases by {4} per unit Rank increased.

techs.name: Smoke Bomb
techs.description: Launches {1} Smoke Bombs towards the enemy every {0}s. The Smoke Bombs have a max range of {2}m and a minimum range of {3}m. The range of units within the smoke is reduced by {4}%.

techs.name: Photon Loop
techs.description: Every {0}s, covers the unit with a photon coating, decreasing damage received by {2}% within {1}s and grants immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects
